name: Node Defense
tagline: First Tower Defense from Siege Studios. Features 60 possible towers, 36 Skills to use. Endlessly merciless waves.
body:
### Welcome to Node Defense
Insert description

### Authors and Contributors
Creation began in November, 2016 by Kevin Wysoczynski @KevinWyso

Special thanks to Asbjørn Thirslund the creator of [Brackey's Tutorials] (https://www.youtube.com/user/Brackeys) which helped me both learn how to use Unity and code in C# as well as providing the basis for a good amount of the mechanics for this tower defense. 

### Screen Shots
Insert in/out of game screen shots

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Node Defense? Contact me at **kevin.wyso.gamedesign@gmail.com** and I’ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
